amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that the Secretary of Agriculture must certify that sufficient horse sanctuaries exist to care for unwanted horses before the law will take effect.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 109-642 to provide that the Secretary of Agriculture must certify that sufficient horse sanctuaries exist to care for unwanted horses before the law will take effect.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goodlatte amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 229, 1 Present (Roll no. 431).
